archimate:BusinessProcess.name: SYS.2.BP1 Specify system requirements
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Use the stakeholder requirements and changes to the stakeholder requirements to identify the required functions and capabilities of the system. Specify functional and non-functional system requirements in a system requirements specification. NOTE 1: Application parameter influencing functions and capabilities are part of the system requirements. NOTE 2: For changes to the stakeholder's requirements SUP.10 applies
